long_description: The Victorinox Specialist Laptop Brief is great for busy professionals. It protects both a small laptop and an iPad(R) or Kindle. Interior organization includes a 13 in. laptop compartment, 10 in. portable electronic-device pocket and 2 mesh peripherals pockets. Exterior organizational pocket contains a deep zippered pocket, 2 padded pockets, stretch-mesh pocket, 2 secure flap-close pockets and a key fob. Exterior zip stash pocket. Rear pocket converts to a sleeve for sliding over wheeled luggage handles. Victorinox Specialist Laptop brief features a removable, adjustable padded shoulder straps and padded haul handles.
short_description: The Victorinox Specialist Laptop Brief is great for busy professionals. It protects both a small laptop and an iPad(R) or Kindle.
